title: Center For Mind Body Therapies - Frederick, MD
description: 2 reviews of Center For Mind Body Therapies "Every experience I've had with The Center For Mind Body Work has been great with Dawn one of the certified massage therapists working at the center. However, there has never been any reception staff available every time I visited their office building. How I was able to locate a massage therapist was through the mountains of paperwork they leave inside their office building. This visit to their office happened several years ago After I moved to Frederick. Excellent place!"

Phil has a benevolent approach to his therapy, making the person feel heard and hopeful. Phil is very open-minded and nonjudgmental, providing healthy and positive perspective on many situations. I have spoken to several people on the benefits of my sessions with Phil and recommend him to anyone searching for guidance on the complexities of life. - 1/16/2019First to Review Every experience I've had with The Center For Mind Body Work has been great with Dawn one of the certified massage therapists working at the center. This visit to their office happened several years ago After I moved to Frederick. Excellent place!
